title: BRIEF-Mahindra CIE Automotive Says Romesh Kaul Resigns As CEO Of Forgings, Stampings And Composites Units
text:
BRIEF-Mahindra CIE Automotive Says Romesh Kaul Resigns As CEO Of Forgings, Stampings And Composites Units

Stock Markets 23 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 16:41)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Mahindra CIE Automotive Says Romesh Kaul Resigns As CEO Of Forgings, Stampings And Composites Units Sept 27 (Reuters) - Mahindra CIE Automotive Ltd : * ROMESH KAUL RESIGNS AS CEO OF CO'S FORGINGS, STAMPINGS AND COMPOSITES DIVISIONS

BRIEF-Mahindra CIE Automotive Says Romesh Kaul Resigns As CEO Of Forgings, Stampings And Composites Units
